mkv49:2: tatra katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo ’pāyeṣūpapanno durvarṇo bhavati rūkṣakāyo ghoradarśanaḥ. ucyate. yaḥ pudgalo dveṣasamutthitena dauḥśīlyena samanvāgato ’pāyeṣūpapadyate. yathā siṁhavyāghrakākaśṛgālakṛṣṇasarpapretapiśācādayaḥ. idaṁ karma yena apāyeṣūpapanno durvarṇo bhavati rūkṣakāyo ghoradarśanaḥ.
